_aLatestUpdates._sText: Updated instructions in the readme.txt of the archive.

_sName: Reworked NAV File for Map CS_SIEGE_PCS
_sText:
This is a navigation file for the bots and hostages to use in the map cs_siege_pcs. Another great remake that deserved gameplay where the bots will use radio chatter properly ;)

You can get the map here: MAP

The nav that came with the map is pretty good already, however there were a few places "disconnected" from the map. Vents were unaccessible by the bots and a whole portion of the map that starts in the underground tunnels and leads up to one of the hostage rooms was disconnected, too. I fixed those issues and place painted the map according to its CS 1.6 counterpart. The new locations in the source version that didn't exsist in the original I named as best as I could. I hope my imagination served me well.

Enjoy!
